A voice suddenly came from behind Lu Ming, startling him.

There was someone behind him, but he didn’t notice it at all.

With his current cultivation and powerful spiritual sense, he did not even notice that someone was standing behind him.

Lu Ming’s back was covered in a layer of cold sweat. He quickly turned around and saw a middle-aged man with a pair of transparent wings on his back.

He was standing not far away, looking at Lu Ming with a smile.

Lu Ming’s eyes were solemn.”You’re The Guardian of this Island?”

“No, I can’t be considered a Guardian!”

The man with the transparent wings shook his head, and said, ” “Strictly

speaking, those are the Guardians!”

His finger was pointing at the statue and the word battle .

“That’s the true Guardian?”

Lu Ming had a puzzled look.

“Not bad. I know you’ve comprehended the Dao of sovereign. This trial is very simple. If you can fully comprehend the will of sovereign from the statue within a hundred years, as well as the word ‘battle’, you’ll pass!”

The man with the transparent wings said.

“What if I don’t fully comprehend it within a hundred years?”

Lu Ming asked.

“If you don’t fully comprehend it, I’ll come and kill you!

The transparent winged man smiled and said casually.

Lu Ming’s eyes narrowed. He did not doubt the other party’s words at all.

This man with transparent wings gave Lu Ming an unfathomable feeling. Lu

Ming felt that he was definitely not his match.

This person was at least a half-God, or even a martial God.

seize the time and properly comprehend it!

I’ll go with you, ” the man said. He then turned and took a step, disappearing.

Lu Ming could not tell how the other party had disappeared.

Hu!

Taking a deep breath, Lu Ming walked toward the cliff.

A hundred years!

Lu Ming did not believe that he could not fully comprehend the nominator’s intent on the statue and the word ‘battle’.

Lu Ming sat down cross-legged not far from the statue and began to comprehend the will of domination on the statue.

The nominator’s will on this statue was much stronger and more profound than the ones on the statues that Lu Ming had encountered before.

Moreover, it was many times denser and deeper.

It was naturally much more difficult to comprehend.

However, Lu Ming was still extremely excited.

He could sense that as he studied the statue, he gained a new understanding of the sovereign Dao, and was able to use it more and more smoothly.

he himself was only using the sovereign path in a barbaric manner, unable to display any of the wondrous aspects of the sovereign path.

However, he could still comprehend some applications of the way of domination from this statue. Naturally, Lu Ming was eager to comprehend and absorb it.

Cultivation knew no time. Five years had passed in a flash. Lu Ming’s comprehension of the Dao of domination was progressing at a rapid pace. He could already feel that he was about to break through.

However, Lu Ming was not in a hurry to break through. Instead, he continued to comprehend for two years. Then, he took out a large number of divine stones and began to absorb them to break through to the next realm.

Not long after, Lu Ming successfully broke through and his cultivation reached six stars great emperor in one go.

haha, with this statue, my cultivation has improved too quickly. I don’t need a hundred years to comprehend this!

Lu Ming was in a good mood and was full of confidence after the breakthrough.

After consolidating his cultivation, Lu Ming continued to study.

Next, it was more difficult to breakthrough. This time, Lu Ming spent more than twenty years before he successfully comprehended it.

Kachaa!

When Lu Ming had fully comprehended the sovereign’s will on the statue, cracks appeared on the statue. Just like the statues Lu Ming had encountered before, they shattered.

“I’ve comprehended all of them. With my current understanding of the Dao of a ruler, I’m completely capable of breaking through. I’ll break through!”

Lu Ming’s eyes lit up. He continued to take out divine stones and refined them crazily.

This time, it took a few months for Lu Ming to break through and reach the peak of Seven Star great emperor realm.

The world Energy and purple-gold energy in his body became more and more intense. With a thought, his body was covered with the purple-gold ruler’s Dao.

Lu Ming felt that he was filled with infinite energy. A casual blow from him could break the stone and shock the sky.

He had reached the peak great emperor realm in the Dao of domination. Lu Ming could suppress ordinary peak heavenly emperors with his Dao of domination alone.

In addition to his strength, which was equivalent to a peak heavenly Emperor,

Lu Ming’s current combat strength was extremely terrifying.

I wonder if I’m confident in fighting against a demigod!

Lu Ming pondered.

He wasn’t sure since he hadn’t fought with them, but he knew that a demigod was much stronger than a peak heavenly Emperor.

He had not fought before, so he was not confident.

in less than 30 years, I’ve already comprehended this statue. Next, I’ll focus on the word ‘battle1!

Lu Ming pondered. After consolidating his cultivation, he looked at the word ‘battle’.

Waves of wonderful concepts emerged in Lu Ming’s heart and he began to comprehend them in detail.

However, a few months later, Lu Ming ended his cultivation. He was a little bewildered.

After a few months of comprehension, he felt that the ‘battle’ word was unfathomable and mysterious beyond imagination.

In the beginning, he seemed to have benefited a lot, but as he continued to comprehend, he became more and more confused and confused.

The word ‘battle’ wasn’t a martial technique, battle technique, or divine ability.

It seemed to be an extremely profound intent realm.

It was as if the word ’battle’ was the source of all battle. Whether it was battle techniques, martial arts, divine arts, or anything else, they were all included in the word ‘battle1.

All-encompassing, the true Paul was all-encompassing.

Lu Ming had a feeling that as long as he understood the word ‘combat’, he would be able to use any combat techniques and divine abilities with ease. He would be able to use any weapon with ease.

“Amazing, this is amazing!”

Lu Ming was not shocked. Instead, he was overjoyed. He had a feeling that this was a great opportunity. As long as he seized it, he would benefit endlessly.

Lu Ming started to comprehend again.

Lu Ming had still underestimated the difficulty of comprehending the word ‘battle’.

In the first ten to twenty years, Lu Ming seemed to have been wandering in confusion and it was difficult for him to gain anything. The difficulty of comprehending the word ‘war’ was much more difficult than the way of the ruler.

Twenty years later, Lu Ming was finally at the beginner level. He had gained quite a lot and was on the right track.

At this time, he had been on this Island for 50 years.

He had been in the yellow Springs world for more than a hundred years.

Lu Ming was completely immersed in cultivation. He was like a sponge, desperately absorbing the water outside.

Very soon, Lu Ming had been on this Island for eighty years. There were only twenty years left before the one-hundred-year period.

Lu Ming was still in the midst of his comprehension and had not finished.

In the center of the yellow spring sea was a huge island. It was the largest island in this Sea area.

There were mountains and countless peaks above, and there were huge palaces built on many of them.

This was the yellow Springs Island!
